type.description: The type of the function tool. Always `function`.

name.description: The name of the function to call.

anyOf.description: A description of the function. Used by the model to determine whether or not to call the function.
A JSON schema object describing the parameters of the function.
Whether to enforce strict parameter validation. Default `true`.

title: Function
description: Defines a function in your own code the model can choose to call. Learn more about [function calling](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/function-calling).
